H0.text: A sophomore is a student in which year of a US college. Fresh

H1.text: A sophomore is a student in which year of a US college. Junior

H2.text: A sophomore is a student in which year of a US college. Senior

H3.text: A sophomore is a student in which year of a US college. Secs

A4.text: The term sophomore is also used to refer to a student in the second year of college or university studies in the United States

A5.text: In high school, a sophomore is equivalent to a tenth grade or Class-10 student
